item1.title: Cashew Nuts
item1.desc: Premium-grade cashew nuts carefully sourced for their rich flavor, creamy texture, and high nutritional value. Ideal for roasting, confectionery, healthy snacks, and food manufacturing

item2.title: Premium Cloves
item2.desc: Hand-picked Tanzanian cloves known for their strong aroma and rich essential oils. Perfect for food processing, herbal blends, and pharmaceutical use

item3.title: PONTE MARKA
item3.desc: PONTE MARKA is a leading exporter and supplier of premium agricultural products, specializing in cashews, cloves, beans, and cardamom. Committed to quality, sustainability, and sourcing directly from Tanzanian farms

item4.title: Premium Speckled Beans
item4.desc: Popular speckled beans available in purple or brown mottled varieties. Known for their attractive appearance, good swelling capacity, and strong market demand. Cultivated across multiple regions in Tanzania

item5.title: Black Pepper
item5.desc: Naturally black pepper with bold aroma and high piperine levels. Suitable for spice processors, wholesalers, and premium retail packaging

item6.title: Dried Green Cardamom
item6.desc: Naturally green cardamom pods with a rich, aromatic flavor. Uniform and bright green, ideal for spice processors and premium packaging

about.title:
Ponte Marka
Trading and Industry Company Limited
about.storyText: Marka Trading and Industry Company Limited is a Tanzania-Italy based agro-food export company with over 7 years of experience. We connect African agricultural excellence with international markets, ensuring certified quality, sustainable sourcing, and reliable logistics for global importers.
points: Transparency and long-term trust with every business partner.
Compliance with phytosanitary, fumigation, and export standards.
Built on years of consistent cooperation in Tanzania and Italy.
Strong local roots—operating with global standards.

corporateIdentity.title: Our Corporate Identity
corporateIdentity.subtitle: Ponte Marka: Beyond Trade.. A Knowledge-Tech Bridge
corporateIdentity.description: Ponte Marka S.R.L. is a pioneering Innovative Startup (Hub Innovativo) born from academic research to redefine global trade in premium agri-food products between Tanzania and Italy. We don't just deliver "commodities"; we provide "technological assets backed by scientific narratives."

leadership.title: Leadership Team: The Synergy of Science and Operations
leadership.intro: Our legal legitimacy and innovative status stem from the unique synergy between our founders, where "Scientific Precision" meets "Cross-Border Field Expertise."

drAhmedSherif.name: Dr. Ahmed Sherif
drAhmedSherif.quote: A Wisdom Bridge between Research, Customs Integrity, and Global Markets
features: Elite Academic Excellence: Double PhD Sapienza Rome & Udine/Trieste
Legal Guarantee: Sworn Interpreter Italian Courts

ahmedShehata.name: Sig. Ahmed Shehata
ahmedShehata.quote: The Engine of Ethical Sourcing and Supply Chain Intelligence in Africa
features: Field Leadership: 15+ years Africa, Tanzania Branch Manager

identitySynthesis.title: Identity Synthesis: A Symphony of Innovation
identitySynthesis.quote: At Ponte Marka, science meets action and expertise meets application. The mind that designs the technological and nutraceutical value of the product aligns with the expert hand that ensures its excellence from the heart of Africa.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: We uphold global quality benchmarks, evidenced by the 10+ international certifications our company has successfully secured.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: To be the bridge of excellence connecting Tanzania's natural richness to global markets, ensuring every product tells a story of quality, sustainability, and international cooperation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: To cultivate, select, and export premium sisal fibers, cashew nuts, and spices, managing the full supply chain from land to shipment with rigorous phytosanitary standards.

integrity.title: Integrity & Trust
integrity.desc: We uphold absolute transparency and build long-term trust with every business partner, fostering reliable and enduring international relationships.

quality.title: Certified Quality
quality.desc: Strict adherence to international standards including ISO, Phytosanitary, Fumigation, and Export compliance ensures premium product quality.

glocal.title: Glocal Approach
glocal.desc: Strong local roots in Tanzania combined with global operational standards guarantee sustainable and professional business practices.

responsive.title: Responsive & Multilingual
responsive.desc: Our website is fully responsive across all devices and supports multiple languages: English, Italian, and Arabic for international accessibility.

gallery.sectionSubtitle: Explore our fields, harvests, and production processes—showcasing the premium quality of our agricultural products and our commitment to excellence.

cashew.tagline: Crunchy and naturally sweet. Selected for size and outturn.
cashew.description: We export raw and processed cashew nuts of the highest quality. Our supply chain guarantees healthy nuts with high outturn rates, perfect for roasting and the Italian and European confectionery industry.
cashew.technicalSpecs:
- Grades (Kernels): WW180, WW210, WW240, WW320 (Whole White)
- Moisture: Max 8-10%
- Defects: < 5%

cloves.tagline: The aromatic essence of Tanzania. Hand-picked.
cloves.description: Our cloves are famous for their high essential oil content and rich reddish-brown color. Carefully cleaned and sorted to ensure they are free from impurities.
cloves.technicalSpecs:
- Quality: CG1 (Hand-picked)
- Moisture: < 12%
 - Stems: Max 2-3%
- Essential Oils: High Content

beans.tagline: Plant-based proteins from the heart of Africa. Soya, White, Yellow, Red Kidney, Black, and Speckled/Pinto Beans.
beans.description: A wide range of legumes cultivated on fertile soils. Includes small to medium White Beans (Navy/Cannellini), large Red Kidney Beans, oval/round Yellow Beans, small Black Beans, and speckled Pinto Beans. Essential, clean, and ready for packaging or processing. Main production: Great Lakes/Western (Kagera & Kigoma), Southern Highlands (Mbeya, Iringa), Northern regions (Arusha, Kilimanjaro, Manyara), and multiple  other regions.
beans.technicalSpecs:
- Types: Red Kidney, Speckled/Pinto
 - Size: Uniform to varied depending on type
- Moisture: Max 13-14%
- (Machine Cleaned)

cardamom.product: Top-grade green cardamom pods, tightly closed and bright green, grown in rainforest shade.
cardamom.tagline: Offers a complex flavor combining sweetness and spice. Cardamom Husks: Outer husks separated from seeds, ideal for flavoring tea, Arabic coffee, ground spice blends, or essential oil extraction at economical cost.
cardamom.technicalSpecs:
- Grade: Bold
- Color: Deep Green after processing
- Seeds: Black and aromatic
- Purity: Cleaned from dust
- Aroma: Light and balsamic

blackpepper.tagline: Premium black pepper from Tanga and Morogoro, dried to preserve piperine. Whole black pepper includes 2 main types:  black pepper FAQ and black pepper MC: 1. Black pepper FAQ is  the type of pepper that is usually only processed simply: separating branches, impurities (soil, stones), not separating large and small seeds, not washed.
blackpepper.technicalSpecs:
- Density: 500GL - 550GL (grams/liter)
- Moisture: Max 12%
- Appearance: Whole, clean grains (de-stoned)
- Color: Natural color

coffee.description: Introducing pristine, fully Washed Arabica green beans sourced from high-altitude estates in the Mbeya and Kilimanjaro regions. This Specialty Grade coffee presents a complex flavour profile featuring bright citrus notes and a full, well-rounded body, ensuring perfect synergy for creating premium espresso blends with rich crema and exceptional consistency.
coffee.technicalSpecs:
- Primary Variety: High-Quality Arabica (Washed). Robusta (Clean) available for density and body enhancement.
- Screen Sizes: AA (18+), AB (16/17), and Peaberry (PB).
- Quality Rating: Specialty Grade (Cupping Score 80+).
- Moisture Content: Guaranteed between 11.0% and 12.5% for optimal roasting stability.
- Purity & Defects: Precise processing to minimize defects according to international SCA standards.
- Packaging: New 60kg Jute bags, with option for GraintPro lining for maximum flavour protection.
- Key Certifications: Phytosanitary Certificate, Quality Certificate, Certificate of Origin.
